thread.section_title: Malayalam - Entertainment - The Times of India
thread.title: Jayaram pens book about elephants
thread.title_full: Jayaram pens book about elephants - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Jayaram pens book about elephants
text:
Jayaram's love for elephants is well-known with the actor even owning one and acting in films with pachyderms such as Pattabhishekam and Aanachandam.
The actor would now be penning a book titled Aalkoottathil Oru Aanapokkam on his tales with elephants. The actor has already finished writing the book, which is scheduled to be released in November.
"It will have photos as well as stories. It will be an interesting read," says the actor, who has just finished the cover shoot for the book.
